H0.text: Wisent is an alternative name for which animal. Bison

H1.text: Wisent is an alternative name for which animal. Aurochs

H2.text: Wisent is an alternative name for which animal. Yak

H3.text: Wisent is an alternative name for which animal. Wisent

A4.text: The European bison is also known as wisent.

A5.text: The term 'wisent' originates from German and refers to the European bison.
